transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello. Haan please sir. Good morning. 
Haan ji. Good morning, good morning. 
Customer: Main aap se baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Executive: Good, good aap batao.
Customer: Main keh raha tha aapko sir kuch difference nazar aa raha hai lead inquiries mein?
Customer: Bahut minor. Aap khud hi dekhenge response achha aayega. Definitely main aapko call bhi karunga. Lekin haan thoda sa improvement to hui hai no doubt. Bahut matlab bahut minor.
Executive: Sir, thoda matlab bahut zyada to main khud bhi nahi kahunga. Kyunki dheere dheere hi sir improvement aata hai. Hai na? Thodi bahut maine dekha tha inquiry thik thak generate hoti hai. Bahut achhi to nahi kahunga. Haan but ye hai ki sir dheere dheere improvement achha aapko dikhne lagega aur business bhi matlab yahan pe aapko milega zaroor se sir. Iske liye aap nishchint rahiye sir. Lekin ek kaam sir mujhe karna padega. Wo jo category maine setting kari thi na wo wo nahi kaam kar payegi aapki dusri wali category. Ruko batata hu.
Customer: Kaise?
Executive: Last time bhi maine bola tha handmade lamp shades. Uski lead ka generation bahut hi less hai sir. To mere hisab se hanging lamp better rahega iske hisab se. Agar isko kar do na, kar do na aap hanging hanging lamp kar do koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Achha ruko haan last time lekin kar kyun nahi paya tha lag raha hai wo category sahi se pakad nahi ja raha tha. Ek minute sir. Company wait sir, uses.
Executive: Bamboo light kaisa hai sir category?
Customer: Bamboo light bhi itna kuch khas nahi hai. Utna achha response aa nahi raha hai. Kya karo isse better TrustSeal mein tha tabhi main ispe aaya tha lekin TrustSeal aur ispe koi difference aa nahi raha hai.
Executive: Sir starting mein. Usme kam lead aa rahi thi. TrustSeal mein kam lead aa rahi thi lekin solid lead thi, sahi thi.
Customer: Achha, achha, achha. Hmm hmm. Okay matlab haan main samajh raha hu sir isi wajah se wo dikkat ho rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm. To koi baat nahi main dekhta hu aapki category ko.
Customer: Isme to TrustSeal mila hua hai complimentary phir kyun dikkat aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan TrustSeal to complimentary rehta hai sir.
Customer: To phir dikkat kya aa rahi hai sir wahi dekho lead inquiry ka generation to ho raha hai lekin conversion nahi aa raha hai na to wahan problematic aapko zyada face karna pad raha hai. Wahan lag raha hai ki kargar nahi hai ye. Hai ki nahi?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Bamboo hanging lamps. Ek minute ruko try karta hu. A B C D E F G H I.
Executive: Hanging well are hanging lights se kaam nahi banega aapka.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Are list to lambi hai.
Executive: Lekin jab usko cross check karke lag raha hai. Bamboo light se kaam nahi chalega na sir aap keh rahe ho?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur hanging light se bhi. Hanging light hata hi do aap lamps lagaao aap na. Light nahi lamp wahan pe. Hanging lamps. Dekhta hu main.
Executive: Aur decorative hanging lights bhi nahi. Decorative decorative decorative hanging lights bhi na. Haan haan wo to aati hi hai.
Customer: Achha decorative uska bhi dekhna padega mujhe by lead ka generation hai ek minute.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Aur phir jo chandeliers wagera hain bade bade unka bhi dekh lo aap.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ab actually mein lagana to bamboo lamp shade chah raha tha lekin ab bamboo lamp wo bamboo lamp shade ek hi cheez ho gayi to phir wo kaam bekar matlab sahi nahi hai wo. Pendant light karke bhi hai aapka lamp shades hai bamboo basket hai. Chandeliers ka kaam kaisa hai sir aapka?
Customer: Bahut achha hai. Lekin haan inquiry yahan se nahi aa rahi hai jo mere purane buyers hain wahi aa raha hai. Isliye keh raha hu chandelier wagera mein dekh lo aap kyunki uske hamara major jo hai focus us pe hi hota hai chandeliers pe.
Executive: Chandeliers kar du kya category sahi rahega sir?
Customer: Karke dekho. Kyunki bamboo lamp bamboo wala to aapka hai hi. Aur chandeliers thoda alag ho jayega. Hmm hmm hmm. Hai na iski visibility aane lagegi. Ek chandeliers kar do aap. Hanging lamp hanging hanging lamp kar do aap aur ek
Executive: Hanging lamp kya hai na?
Executive: Wo aapka handmade bamboo lamp to hai hi sir aapka.
Customer: Nahi hanging lamp hanging lamp.
Executive: Hanging lamp ka option nahi dikha raha hai isme actually mein. List to bahut lambi hai isme hanging lamp nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: To phir kya kya hai? Chandeliers ka aa raha hai. Chandeliers ka aa raha hai. Dekho aur padh ke batau to bahut lamba hi hai pura. Essen furniture, aluminium flower vase, aluminium ashtray.
Executive: A A wala hai phir B B ka aa gaya baking tools, bamboo basket, bamboo blinds, bamboo lamp, bamboo lamp shade, bamboo lantern, bamboo light, bamboo mats, bamboo panel, bamboo place mats. Hai na aise karke bamboo ka bahut sara ho gaya. Phir aapka brass se related jo hai brass candle holder, brass charger plate hai na brass diya, brass stand, brass god statue. Phir C se aapka cane wale hain candle wala product hai sara. Theek hai abhi to filhal lighting mein hi laga hua hai aap chandelier karke dekh lo aap kuch dino ke liye.
Customer: Chandeliers mujhe lagta hai ki kar do to sahi rahega sir.
Executive: Chandeliers mein aapka by lead ka consumption bhi hai aur chandeliers mein jo hai by lead ka approval bhi hai matlab IndiaMART pe requirement bhi uski thik thak post ho rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye kar sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai isko hi rakhte hain sir chandeliers karte hain hai na?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Theek hai baki aur dekhte hain phir jaise jaise improvement hoga batana sir mujhe aap.
Customer: Agar kuch bhi improvement positive dikhe to batana to samajh mein bhi aayega na ki maine kya kiya to hua hoga.
Executive: Sure sure sure. Theek hai. Theek hai ji. Thank you sir. Okay okay. Thank you sir. You welcome you welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Customer is not getting conversion from leads.

- Customer wants to change the product category.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to change category to chandeliers.

- Executive informed about by lead consumption in chandeliers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will change the category to chandeliers.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, chandeliers, trustseal
